rules_text:
This creature enters with a bounty counter.
Whenever this creature attacks, put a stun counter on it and a bounty counter on target creature defending player controls. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead. The protector of an attacked permanent is also a defending player.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]A bounty as large as its stomach.[/i]
